tool_description: A free restful API serving quality anime quotes
name: Anime Quotes
title: Anime Quotes

api_list.name: Get quotes by character name
Get quotes by anime title
Get 10 random quotes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-quotes1.p.rapidapi.com/api/quotes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-quotes1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
